alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Wayne (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 1:56PM MDT until June 23 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Garfield County in southern Utah... Southeastern Wayne County in southern Utah... * Until 300 PM MDT * At 155 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Hanksville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hanksville. This includes Utah Route 95 between mile markers 2 and 18. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
